task.title: How we are getting to Key West
task.shortdesc: Because flights are so expensive during spring break season, we decided to make the long 20 hour drive down to Key West

taskbody.context: We are splitting the drive into 2 days

step.cmd: We are leaving at 9 am on Friday morning from Blacksburg. Va.
There are five of us in the car, that will be taking turns having driving shifts until we arrive in Titusville, Florida.
We have a hotel booked in Titusville for Friday night so we can get some much needed rest before continuing the last stretch of driving to the Keys.
We will wake up early Saturday morning and finish the last 6 hours down to Key West
